quote_2: “Attack is the secret of defense; defense is the planning of an attack.“ -Sun Tzu
about_text1:
This website serves as a place to archive and display all of my current and future projects in music, game development, programming etc. It also includes future web tools, all accessed through here. Feel free to contact me for any questions or ideas, all of my contact information is in the bottom.
This website is open source to use as an example for SolidJS and other tools. Anyone can freely view the code, just don't completely copy everything.
